docTitle.titlePart:
3rd
EUROPEAN
CONFERENCE
on
RAPID PROTOTYPING
&
MANUFACTURING

front.div:
This is a two day conference and exhibition on Rapid Prototyping &
Manufacturing (including Stereolithography, Selective Laser Sintering,
Laminated Object Manufacturing and Solider). Presentations will include
papers on the effect on management, design and manufacturing. There will
be a variety of application papers as well as papers on current research.
These new technologies are able to reduce prototype lead times by up to
95% and will have a major effect on industry in the future.
front.note: Contact:- Donna Borrill, Dept. Manufacturing Engineering & Operations Management University of Nottingham, University Park, Nottingham. NG7 2RD Tel 0602 514056 or Fax. 0602 514000 78
